titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor the aldermen and governors of the several hospitals of the city, at St. Bridget's Church on Easter-Tuesday, 1698, being one of the anniversary spittle-sermons / by Sa. Freemam.
titleStmt.author: Freeman, Samuel, 1643-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Warren for Thomas Bennet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
